content.question: English colonization patterns in North America differed most from Spanish colonization in that the English

choices.label: more often settled as families and rarely intermarried with Native Americans
relied more on coerced labor from Native Americans
enjoyed relatively peaceful relations with Native Americans
adopted some of Native Americansâ€™ more egalitarian views on the roles of women

content.answer: more often settled as families and rarely intermarried with Native Americans

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
